# Package sporegr

# sporegr

This package will help you work with data from the Spöreg mobile app.
The package contains functions to read (and do some cleanup) of data
files exported from predefined queries in APEX (datastore).

I also contains rmarkdown templates for some reports. This package is
probably not useful for the general public.

To install try remotes::install_github(“SLU-Aqua-large-lakes/sporegr”,
build_vignettes = TRUE)

# Package index

## All functions

- [`APEX_options()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/APEX_options.md)
  : Set or get options for reading APEX Spöreg data
- [`calc_date_breaks()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/calc_date_breaks.md)
  : calc_date_breaks
- [`fix_fangst_missing_fangstdattid()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/fix_fangst_missing_fangstdattid.md)
  : Fix missing datetime on fangster
- [`integer_breaks()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/integer_breaks.md)
  : integer_breaks
- [`minutes2HHMM()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/minutes2HHMM.md)
  : Minutes to HH:MM
- [`read_anvlista()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/read_anvlista.md)
  : Read a file with registered sporeg users
- [`read_fangst_clean()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/read_fangst_clean.md)
  : Read a file with APEX export of fångster from Spöreg database and do
  some cleanup
- [`read_ovrighandelse_clean()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/read_ovrighandelse_clean.md)
  : Read a file with APEX export of Övrighändelse from Spöreg database
  and do some cleanup
- [`read_resa_clean()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/read_resa_clean.md)
  : Read a file with APEX export of resor from Spöreg database and do
  some cleanup
- [`sporegApp()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/sporegApp.md)
  : sporegApp
- [`sporeg_bbox()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/sporeg_bbox.md)
  : sporeg_bbox
- [`sporeg_points()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/sporeg_points.md)
  : sporeg_points
- [`scale_color_sporeg()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/sporegr_scales.md)
  [`scale_fill_sporeg()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/sporegr_scales.md)
  [`scale_color_sporeg_art()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/sporegr_scales.md)
  [`scale_fill_sporeg_art()`](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/reference/sporegr_scales.md)
  : Create discrete scales for sporegr

- [Creating reports for the users of
  Spöreg](https://kagervall.github.io/sporegr/articles/user-reports.md):
